Title: Enacts the "New York State Resident Experience Act of 2024"
Summary: Requires state agencies to measure, collect, report, and utilize metrics relating to the experience of residents interacting with agencies to improve provision of services to the people of the state, and to provide a biannual report to the governor and legislature.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to enacting the New York State Resident Experience Act of 2024
